anya-e0401n8:1_2: Vidito viññāto nāmarūpa vibhāgo yenāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:1_9: Kathaṁ kasiṇabhāvanādikaṁ yogakammaṁ attāva attano ṭhānaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘ādimajjhapariyosānānaṁhī’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:1_11: ‘‘Padaṭṭhānatāyā’’ti etena tiṭṭhati anivattamānaṁ pavattati etenāti ṭhānanti atthena padaṭṭhānameva ṭhānanti vuccatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:1_13: ‘‘Dasakasiṇānī’’tiādīsu mukhyato vā upacārato vā dvidhāpi atthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘dasakasiṇānī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_17: ‘‘Saṁsagga bhedo’’ti ekamekassa puggalassa kassaci dvecariyā, kassaci tissotiādinā sammissa vibhāgo.
anya-e0401n8:1_19: ‘‘Sabbāyapi appanāyā’’ti jhānappanāya ca maggappanāya ca phalappanāya ca.
anya-e0401n8:1_26: Tathāhi visuddhimagge vāyokasiṇa vidhāne caturaṅgulappamāṇaṁ sīsaṁ vātena pahariyamānaṁ disvāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_28: ‘‘Kataṁ vā’’ti nīlādivaṇṇavisesarahitaṁ aruṇavaṇṇaṁ mattikakkhaṇḍaṁ udakena madditvā cakkamaṇḍalaṁ viya parimaṇḍalaṁ sumaṭṭhatalaṁ pathavimaṇḍalaṁ karonti.
anya-e0401n8:1_30: ‘‘Akataṁ vā’’ti katthaci bhūmibhāge kenaci akataṁ sayaṁ jātaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:2_0: Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
anya-e0401n8:4_1: Tattha jambudīpassa kasiṇato sāpītivarā evāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:4_3: Sakalassa jambudīpamaṇḍalassa issariyādhipatito pīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:4_5: ‘‘Saṇṭhāna paññattī’’ti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena upaṭṭhitā nimittapaññatti eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:4_8: Candasūriyānaṁ aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhāti samāso.
anya-e0401n8:5_10: ‘‘Tadeva puna paccitvā’’ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
anya-e0401n8:5_15: ‘‘Apakaḍḍhitvā’’ti khaṇḍāni sarīrato mocetvā taṁ taṁ padesaṁ kaḍḍhitvā.
anya-e0401n8:6_1: Guṇino dabbassa nāmena guṇānaṁ gahetabbattāti vuttaṁ ‘‘buddhaguṇassa anussati buddhānussatī’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:6_4: Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṁ vigatamalamaccheraṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_6: ‘‘Attanā adhigatanibbānañcā’’ti etena ariyapuggalānaṁ kilesānaṁ accantavūpasamo vutto.
anya-e0401n8:6_8: Hitūpasaṁhāro nāma ayaṁ puggalo avero hotu, abyāpajjo hotūtiādinā averatādīni hitasukhāni tasmiṁ puggale cittena upasaṁharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_9: Karuṇā, muditā, heṭṭhā cetasikasaṅgahe vuttatthā eva.
anya-e0401n8:6_10: Hitūpasaṁhāro ca hitamodanā ca ahitāpanayanañcāti dvando.
anya-e0401n8:6_14: Tattha paraṁ hitasukhasampannaṁ disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṁ hitamodanā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_15: Paraṁ dukkhitaṁ disvā ayaṁ imamhādukkhā muccatu, mākilamatūti evaṁ cittena parasmiṁ ahitassa dukkhassa apanayanaṁ ahitāpanayanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_19: Attanā katakammaṁ eva sakaṁ yesaṁ te kammassakā.
anya-e0401n8:6_23: ‘‘Sīmasambhedo’’ti attā ca piyapuggalo ca majjhattapuggalo ca veripuggalo cāti catasso sīmā.
anya-e0401n8:6_27: Sabbā itthiyo, sabbepurisātiādinā odhiso paricchedato pharaṇaṁ odhisopharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_28: Sabbesattā, sabbepāṇā, sabbebhūtātiādinā anodhiso aparicchedato pharaṇaṁ anodhisopharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_29: Puratthimāyadisāya sabbesattā averāhontūtiādinā disāvibhāgavasena pharaṇaṁ disāpharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_30: ‘‘Taṁ samaṅgīno cā’’ti tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā.
anya-e0401n8:6_32: Brahmasaddo vā seṭṭhapariyāyo ‘brahmaṁ puññaṁ pasavatī’tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n8:6_42: Catubbidhopi hi āhāro bhājanesu vā hatthamukhādīsu vā yattha yattha sammakkheti, laggati, limpati.
anya-e0401n8:6_45: Āsayato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa ajjhoharīyamānassa kaṇṭhādīsu ṭhitehi pittasemhādīhi āsayehi sammissanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_48: Pakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa nidhānagatassa paripakkakāle gūthamuttādibhāvapattito paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_49: Apakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tasmiṁ aparipakke ajiṇṇe sati sarīre nānāroguppattivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_50: Phalato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa paripakkakālato paṭṭhāya sarīre kesalomādīnaṁ paṭikūlarāsīnaṁ vaḍḍhanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_51: Nissandato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa na vahidvārehi vā lomakūpehivā aññehi nānāvaṇamukhehi vā uggharaṇa paggharaṇādivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_53: ‘‘Nikantippahānasaññā’’ti kantāramagge mātāpitūnaṁ kantāranittaraṇatthāya putta maṁsakhādane viya ati manuññepi āhāre rasataṇhā pahānavasena pavattā saññā.
anya-e0401n8:6_55: ‘‘Rāgena caratī’’ti ettha ‘‘rāgenā’’ti karaṇatthe, itthambhūtalakkhaṇevā karaṇa vacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_56: Tattha karaṇatthetāva ‘‘rāgena caratī’’ti catūsu iriyāpathesu yebhūyyena rāgacittena carati.
anya-e0401n8:6_58: Itthambhūta lakkhaṇe pana ‘‘rāgena caratī’’ti tesu rāgaketu rāgadhajo hutvā vicaratīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:6_64: Muditā bhāvetabbā aratiyā pahānāyāti imaṁ pāḷisesaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:6_67: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ aratiyā yadidaṁ muditā ceto vimuttīti evaṁ nissaraṇa bhāvavacanato ca.
anya-e0401n8:6_70: ‘‘Dosa vatthuttābhāvato cā’’ti dosuppattiyā vatthu bhāvassakaraṇa bhāvassa abhāvato ca.
anya-e0401n8:6_71: Nīlādīni cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_72: Kasmāpanettha dosa caritassa upekkhā sappāyakāraṇaṁ visuṁ na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n8:6_79: Visuddhi magge pana evaṁ vuttaṁ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:6_83: Buddhivisayabhūtāni maraṇa upasamasaññā vavatthānānipi mohacaritassa sappāyāni siyunti vuttaṁ ‘‘evañhisatī’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_86: Evaṁsati vaṇṇakasiṇānaṁ puthulakhuddakatāpi ettha saṅgahitā hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:6_89: Evaṁsati khuddakaṁ vitakkacaritasseva sappāyaṁ, na buddhicaritādīnanti evamatthopi gaṇheyya.
anya-e0401n8:6_90: Atha buddhicaritassa pana asappāyaṁ nāma natthīti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjheyyāti iminā adhippāyena ‘‘khuddakanti padeyujjatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_91: Athavā, puthulaṁ mohacaritassa, khuddakaṁ vitakkacaritasseva, namohacaritassāti atthe sati, buddhicaritādīnaṁ pana puthulaṁpi khuddakaṁpi anuññātaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_94: Vitakka carite ca atisappāyatāya saddhābuddhi caritesūti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_1: Guṇānaṁ’’ti ettha guṇasaddo pubbapadesu yojetabbo buddhaguṇānañca dhammaguṇānañcātiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:7_7: Saṁvejaniyo dhammo yassāti saṁvejaniya dhammaṁ. Maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_14: Na te kadāci somanassena vinā appanaṁ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_15: Byāpādavihiṁsā aratīnaṁ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā pañcamajjhāne viya sukhasomanassānañca avikkhambhanato.
anya-e0401n8:7_19: Nimittaṁ daḷhavibhūtaṁ katvā gahaṇaṁ daḷha vibhūtaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_21: ‘‘Paṭibhāganimittaṁ’’ti ettha paṭibhāgasaddo tassa dise pavattoti āha ‘‘tādise’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_22: ‘‘Taṁsaṇṭhāne’’ti etena pathavimaṇḍalādīsu viya saṇṭhānākārena ṭhitesu sabhāva dhamma puñjesu eva tassadisaṁ paṭibhāganimittaṁ nāma sijjhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n8:7_23: ‘‘Eva’’nti samathasaṅgahe tāva dasakasiṇāni, dasaasubhātiādinā vuttena vacanakkamena.
anya-e0401n8:7_24: ‘‘Uggahakosallaṁ’’ti bhāvanākammaṁ ārabhitukāmena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santike sabbassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānassa uggahaṇaṁ uggaho.
anya-e0401n8:7_27: Sabbaṁ uggahituṁ asakkontena yaṁ attanā ārabhissati.
anya-e0401n8:7_30: ‘‘Gahaṇaṁ’’ti ca yathā citte avinassamānaṁ hutvā labbhati, tathā katvā cittena gahaṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘uparūparī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_33: Tasmiṁ nimittaggahaṇakamme yaṁ yaṁ kattabbavidhānaṁ atthi, taṁ taṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā gahaṇanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_36: Uggaha nimitte saṇṭhānaṁ gaṇhantopi vaṇṇarūpādinā sabhāva dhammena saheva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_37: Paṭibhāganimitte pana sabhāvadhammaṁ muñcitvā tassa disaṁ nimitta paññatti saṅkhātaṁ suddhasaṇṭhānameva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_38: Ettha siyā, paṭibhāganimittepi vaṇṇo nāma sandissati yevāti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_43: ‘‘Pavesitaṁ’’ti bhāvanācittassa abbhantare pakkhittaṁ viya hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_51: ‘‘Nimittarakkhaṇavidhānaṁ’’ti samuppannassa nimittassa anassanatthāya sattavidhehi palibodha dhammehi rakkhaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_54: Visuddhi magge eva te vuttāti dassetuṁ gāthamāha.
anya-e0401n8:7_61: ‘‘Kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā’’ti etena kāmabhūmi kāmabhavasamatikkamo, rūpabhūmirūpabhava okkamo ca vutto.
anya-e0401n8:7_80: ‘‘Vitakkādikaṁ oḷārikaṅgaṁ pahānāyā’’ti ettha kassa balena pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_81: Taṁ taṁ virāga bhāvanā balena pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_82: Kāca taṁ taṁ virāgabhāvanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_83: Ajjhāsaya visesa pariggahitā upacārabhāvanā evāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘pathamajjhānaṁ tāvā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_84: ‘‘Ātāpavīriyaṁ’’ti yenavīriyena yogino attānaṁ vā kilesa dhamme vā ātāpenti paritāpenti.
anya-e0401n8:7_87: Taṁ ārabbha uparijhānantaruppattiyā bhāvanaṁ karontassapi punappunaṁ tameva pañcamajjhānaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:7_88: Ārammaṇe ca anatikkante jhānaṁpi anatikkantameva hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:7_95: Maraṇa saññā vavatthānesu parikammañca samādhiyati, upacāro ca sampajjatīti yojanā tikkhapaññānaṁ pana puthujjanānaṁpi sataṁ buddhaguṇādīsupi upacāra sambhavo aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_98: Pubbedānaṁ datvā iminā puññena āyatiṁ jhānābhiññāyo vā maggaphalāni vā paṭilabhissāmīti patthanaṁ katvā āgatopi katādhikāro evātipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_100: Aṭṭhavidhesu catukkanayavasena, navavidhesu pañcakanayavasena vuttoti tesaṁ vādīnaṁ sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_102: Ākāsa kasiṇena vinā arūpajjhānāni labhitvā puna abhiññatthāya parikammekate ākāsakasiṇepi kattabbattā tassa abhiññāpādakatā sambhavo vuttoti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n8:7_103: Pubbe abhāvita bhāvanoti ca akatādhikāroti ca atthato ekaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_105: ‘‘Tādisānaṁ’’ti pubbe akatādhikārānaṁ abhāvitabhāvanānaṁ idāni iddhivikubbanaṁ karissāmīti ārabhantānaṁ abhiññākamme ādikammikakulaputtānanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:7_107: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ savanaṁ karissāmītiādikaṁpi gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_109: Abhiññāsu vasipattānampi taṁ pañcamajjhānaṁ chasuārammaṇesu yathārahaṁ appetiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_110: ‘‘Adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ’’ti yathicchita nipphattatthāya sataṁ hotu sahassaṁ hotūtiādinā cittena abhividhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_112: ‘‘Sataṁ homi, sahassaṁ homīti vā’’ti attānaṁ sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā nimminanavasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_114: Sotuṁ vā saddaṁ, passituṁ vā rūpaṁ, jānituṁ vā paracittaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_119: Duvidhaṁhi adhiṭṭhānaṁ parikammena adhiṭṭhānaṁ abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_126: ‘‘Sesābhiññāsupi yathārahaṁ vattabbo’’ti dibbasotaparikamme tenevaparikamma samādhiññāṇasotena āsanne dibbavisayaṁpi saddaṁ suṇātītiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0401n8:7_129: ‘‘Idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ’’ti therassa matena daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_130: Idha pana ādikammikavidhānappadhānattā pacchimaṁpi pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṁ vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_131: ‘‘Kāyagatikaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā’’ti ayaṁ kāyo viya idaṁ cittaṁpi dandhagamanaṁ hotūti evaṁ cittaṁ kāyagatikaṁ karaṇena adhiṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0401n8:7_132: ‘‘Dissamānena kāyenā’’ti dandhagamanena gacchantattā bahujanānampi dissamānena rūpakāyena.
anya-e0401n8:7_136: Itaraṁ pana hadaya vatthurūpaṁ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_137: Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṁ vicāraṇā atthīti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ tāvā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_146: ‘‘Itarathā’’ti aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati.
anya-e0401n8:7_148: Kasmā, santati addhāvasena paccuppanne gahite sati, sabbāya ekajavanavīthiyā ekapaccuppannattā.
anya-e0401n8:7_154: ‘‘Nibbānañcā’’ti vuttaṁ, kathaṁ nibbānaṁ pubbenivutthaṁ nāma siyāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_155: Atīte parinibbutānaṁ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṁ ārammaṇabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁpi anussaratiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_156: Tattha tesaṁ maggaphalānaṁ atītattā nibbānaṁpi pubbenivutthaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:8_0: ‘‘Yaṁ yaṁ adhiṭṭhātī’’ti yaṁ yaṁ satādikaṁ saṁvidhāti.
anya-e0401n8:8_1: ‘‘Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī’’ti yena yena āvibhāvādikena pakārena saṁvidhāti.
anya-e0401n8:8_5: ‘‘Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ’’ti ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṁ sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_11: Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_13: Imasmiṁ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṁpi ārammaṇaṁ pakatiñāṇassa visayoti katvā ‘‘dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_15: ‘‘Yathā cetaṁ’’ti yathā ca etaṁ imasmiṁ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti.
anya-e0401n8:10_4: Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:10_6: Idampi so gacchantopi nanassati, tiṭṭhantopi nanassatītiādinā thirākārasaṇṭhitaṁ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n8:10_7: ‘‘Sukhanimittaṁ’’ti khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabheda dukkhānaṁ abhāvato sukhito niddukkho nibbhayotiādinā sukhākārasaṇṭhitaṁ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n8:10_8: ‘‘Attanimittaṁ’’ti gantuṁ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṁ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṁ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n8:11_3: Tattha niccasīlameva uparijhānādivisesānaṁ adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṁ ‘‘niccasīlamevā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:11_12: Visuddhisadda sampanne hi sati, cittavisuddhi icceva vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:11_14: ‘‘Soḷasavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ’’ti ahosiṁ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṁ soḷasavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_15: ‘‘Aṭṭhavidhaṁ vā kaṅkhaṁ’’ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme āgataṁ aṭṭhavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_16: Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṁ uppattiyā akāraṇameva kāraṇaṁ katvā gahaṇadiṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n8:11_26: Evaṁsati, ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha ‘‘etthacā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_28: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṁ sutamayaññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:11_29: Atthaṁ ñatvā atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṁ ñāṇaṁ cintāmayaññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:11_33: Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṁ katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_36: Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṁ bhāvanā kammaṁ nāma tattha icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:12_2: Aniccānaṁ vā saṅkhata dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n8:12_3: ‘‘Abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanākāro’’ti yathā sīghasotāyaṁ nadiyaṁ nāvāya uddhaṁ gacchantaṁ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti.
anya-e0401n8:12_4: Kasmā, asati abhisaṅkhāre taṅkhaṇe eva adhovuyhanato.
anya-e0401n8:12_7: Evamevaṁ sīghasote saṁsāre attabhāvena uddhaṁ khaṇato khaṇaṁ divasato divasaṁ gacchantaṁ puggalaṁ ayaṁ attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti.
anya-e0401n8:12_8: Kasmā, asati abhisaṅkhāre, paccayavekalle ca sati, taṅkhaṇe eva vipariṇamanato.
anya-e0401n8:12_12: Ettha ca saṁsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṁ nāma rūpadhammānaṁ pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:12_13: Ettha ca maraṇaṁ duvidhaṁ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha maraṇañca.
anya-e0401n8:12_14: Tattha sammuti maraṇaṁ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:12_16: Paramattha maraṇaṁ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṁ nāmarūpa dhammānaṁ maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:12_18: Imasmiṁ vipassanā kamme idaṁ paramattha maraṇaṁ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:12_19: Dhammānaṁ susānakkhettanti ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n8:12_20: Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya santānaṁ anubandhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:12_21: Anubandhattā ca sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma samayo natthi, yattha sattā na marantīti.
anya-e0401n8:12_23: Tesaṁ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca sambādhapattito.
anya-e0401n8:12_24: Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccanubhavantānaṁ pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0401n8:12_25: Vasavattanehi sati, abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccassa okāso natthi.
anya-e0401n8:12_27: Lokasmiñhi sabbaṁpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṁ nāma antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṁ upādāya dhammānaṁ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
anya-e0401n8:13_4: ‘‘Purāṇa dhammānaṁ’’ti purāṇānaṁ pātubbhūtānaṁ, vaḍḍhitānañca dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṁ antaradhānaṁ vayo vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:13_5: Vipassanā kammaṁ patvā khaṇikavasena ekekadhammavibhāgavasena ca anupassanā kiccaṁ natthīti āha ‘‘samūha santativasena panā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:13_6: Ekekadhammavibhāgavasena anupassanāpi pana pakatiyā supākaṭesu cittavedanādīsu icchitabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n8:13_7: ‘‘Aniccatāya paramākoṭī’’ti tato uttari aniccatā nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:13_8: Dhammānaṁ tathā tathā bhāyitabbappakāro nāma pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, tiādinā vutto bhāyitabbappakāro.
anya-e0401n8:13_10: Etena apāyadukkha saṁsāra dukkhabhīrukehi janehi bhāyitabbanti bhayaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_12: Bhayassa samanu passanāñāṇaṁ bhayañāṇanti imamatthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n8:13_18: ‘‘Cattālīsāya ākārehī’’ti pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato, ītito,.
anya-e0401n8:13_19: Upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, atāṇato, aleṇato, assaraṇato, rittato,.
anya-e0401n8:13_20: Tucchato, suññato, anattato, ādīnavato, vipariṇāma dhammato, asārakato, aghamūlato, vadhakato, vibhavato, sāsavato,.
anya-e0401n8:13_21: Saṅkhatato, mārāmisato, jātidhammato, jarādhammato, byādhidhammato, maraṇadhammato, sokaparidevadhammato, dukkhadomanassa dhammato, upāyāsa dhammato, saṁkilesika dhammato, passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhatīti evaṁ mahāniddese moghapañhaniddese āgatehi cattālīsāya ākārehi.
anya-e0401n8:13_24: Sabbepi pañcakkhandhā aniccā evāti passantoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:13_25: Kathaṁ pana aniccato passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhatīti.
anya-e0401n8:13_26: Niccaguṇa suññatāya suññato pañcakkhandhabhūtaṁ lokaṁ avekkhati.
anya-e0401n8:13_28: Tattha ‘‘aniccā evā’’ti paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yadākadāci maraṇa dhammattā aniccā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_33: Yehi keci loke cakkhu rogādikā anekasahassā rogā nāma sandissanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_37: Api ca, dukkhasacca dhammattātīhi dukkhatāhi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi ca abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanato rujjanaṭṭhena rogā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_38: Tattha ‘‘tīhi dukkhatāhī’’ti dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāra dukkhatā vipariṇāma dukkhatāti imāhi tīhidukkhatāhi.
anya-e0401n8:13_39: ‘‘Catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehī’’ti dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho,ti imehi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi.
anya-e0401n8:13_43: Sallaṁ nāma vijjhanaṭṭhena kilesa sallañca dukkhasallañca.
anya-e0401n8:13_45: Ime ca khandhā vipattipariyosānattā niratthakā eva honti.
anya-e0401n8:13_48: Na hi te etaṁ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attāti evaṁ vissāsaṁ arahanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_49: Tathā vissāsaṁ karontassa nānādukkhehi niccaṁ vihiṁsanato.
anya-e0401n8:13_50: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yadākadāci palujjanadhammattā palokadhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_52: Khandhā antarāya jātikā evāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:13_53: Ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā dutattā vibādhakattā upaddavā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_55: Anattā eva samānā ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā sajjanato lagganato dummo cayato upasaggā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_59: Jarāmaraṇādito apāyavinipatanādito bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_60: Te ca khandhā kassacitāṇā na honti.
anya-e0401n8:13_63: Bhayato bhīrukā janā līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_71: Niccatādīhi sabbehi sobhaṇaguṇehi sabbaso rahitattā tucchattā suññattārittā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_74: Attā vuccati yassakassaci koci sārabhūto paṭissaraṇo.
anya-e0401n8:13_78: Aniccatādīhi ādīnavehi dosehi sampuṇṇattā ādīnavā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_82: Te sayaṁ maraṇa dhammasamaṅgīno hutvā tena maraṇasatthena maraṇāvudhena saṁsāre sattānaṁ niccaṁ mārakattā jīvitindriyupacchedakattā vadhakā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_87: Anicchantasseva sato cakkhurogādibhāvena apāyabhavādibhāvena jātasabhāvattā jātidhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_88: Anicchantasseva sato hāyanamaraṇasabhāvattā jarāmaraṇa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_89: Sokādīnaṁ vatthubhāvena dhāraṇattā sokādi dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_90: Taṇhā saṁkilesa diṭṭhisaṁkilesa duccarita saṁkilesehi niyuttattā saṁkilesika dhammā evāti.
anya-e0401n8:14_0: Loke attajīvā nāma sattānaṁ ajjhatta dhammesu sāradhammā honti.
anya-e0401n8:14_1: Tesu vigatesu sesadhammā nissatta nijjīvabhāvaṁ patvā pheggubhūtā kacavarabhūtāti lokassa abhimāno.
anya-e0401n8:14_2: Te ca attajīvā nāma sabbaso natthīti diṭṭhe khandhesu kacavarabhāvadassanaṁ attajīva suññatā dassanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_5: ‘‘Nimittānī’’ti vipallāsadhammehi nimmitāni niccanimitta sukhanimitta attanimitta jīvanimittāni.
anya-e0401n8:14_6: Satta puggala itthi purisa hattha pāda sīsa gīvādīni nimittāni ca.
anya-e0401n8:14_7: Tattha saṅkhārānaṁ khaṇika dhammattā aniccānaṁyeva sataṁ santati ghanena paṭicchannattā hiyyopi so eva, ajjapi so evātiādinā niccākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ niccanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_8: Kilesamalehi pariggahitattā asubhānaṁyeva sataṁ avijjāya paṭicchannattā idaṁ iṭṭhaṁ, kantaṁ, manāpaṁ, piyarūpa, ntiādinā subhākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ subhanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_9: Bhayaṭṭhena akhemaṭṭhena dukkhānaṁpi sataṁ tāyeva paṭicchannattā idaṁ sukhaṁ, nibbhayaṁ, khemaṁ, sātarūpa, ntiādinā sukhākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ sukhanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_10: Paccayā yattavuttikattā paccayena vinā kevalaṁ attano vasāyattavuttitā bhāvato anattānaṁyeva sataṁ attano icchāvasena karoti, katheti, cinteti, gantuṁ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṁ icchanto tiṭṭhatī, tiādinā vasavattanākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ attanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_11: Tathā sattonāma sattāhaṁpi jīvati, māsaṁpi jīvati, saṁvaccharaṁpi jīvatītiādinā jīvākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ jīvanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_12: Nanu cettha attano icchāvasena karotītiādīsu icchānāma taṇhāvāchando vā.
anya-e0401n8:14_15: Evañcasati tesaṁ cittavasena pavattattā attano icchāvasena karotīti idaṁ abhidhammaviruddhaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:14_18: Na hi attānāma atthi, yo attanoti vucceyya.
anya-e0401n8:14_19: Na ca kattānāma atthi, yo karotīti vucceyya.
anya-e0401n8:14_20: Idha pana tasmiṁ samaye pavattaṁ khandhapañcakameva attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:14_23: Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena vinicchayaṁ pāpetvāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:15_0: ‘‘Taṁ taṁ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā’’ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṁ bhindana chindanavasena.
anya-e0401n8:15_3: Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:15_4: Maggakkhaṇaṁ patvā eva tadubhayaṁpi sabbaso samucchindatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:16_14: ‘‘Tividhakuhanavatthūhī’’ti paccayappaṭisevanañca, sāmantajappanañca, iriyā patha sannissitañcāti imehi tividhehi kuhanavatthūhi.
anya-e0401n8:16_19: ‘‘Gedhassā’’ti sammohattāyeva paccayesu bhattanikkhittakā kassaviya gedhassa, abhikaṅkhassa.
anya-e0401n8:16_22: Taṁ taṁ payojana mariyādo nāma cīvarapaccaye tāva sītappaṭighātādiko payojanamariyādo.
anya-e0401n8:16_23: ‘‘Mariyādo’’ti ca yāvadevāti padena dassito sītappaṭighātādiko cīvarappayojana paricchedo.
anya-e0401n8:16_24: So ca cīvarapaccaye sammohādike sāvajjapakkhe apatanatthāya ṭhapito.
anya-e0401n8:16_25: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassa pahānatthaṁ’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:16_28: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṁ paṭisevati yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyātiādīsu yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya paṭisevati.
anya-e0401n8:16_29: Na tato uttari sammohatthāya gedhatthāya madatthāya pamādatthāya paṭisevatītiādi.
anya-e0401n8:16_30: Evañcasati, yaṁ cīvaraṁ paṭisevantassa sammohagedhamadappamādā uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n8:17_5: Pajjati gacchati pavattati phalaṁ etenāti padaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:17_10: Diṭṭhivippayuttā pana saññā citta vipallāsā vikkhambhituṁ sakkotīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n8:17_11: ‘‘Sāsana dhamme’’ti anattalakkhaṇa suttantādike suññata dhammappaṭisaṁyutte desanādhamme.
anya-e0401n8:17_12: ‘‘Diṭṭhivipallāso vikkhambhito’’ti tādisaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā desake satthari ca desite dhamme ca saddhaṁ paṭilabhitvā saccameva bhagavā āha, ahaṁ pana etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā,ti gaṇhāmi, micchāvatāyaṁ mamagāhoti evaṁ vikkhambhito hoti.
anya-e0401n8:17_13: Tato paṭṭhāya eso me attāti vadantopi diṭṭhisampayuttacittena na vadati.
anya-e0401n8:17_17: Taṁ pana dhammavavatthānaññāṇe siddhe eva sijjhatītipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n8:17_18: Catunnaṁ āhārānaṁ vasena catudhā nāmarūpaṁ pariggahetabbameva.
anya-e0401n8:17_19: Kasmā, cattāro āhāre pariggahetvā tesveva lakkhaṇattayaṁ samanupassantassa ante lokuttaraññāṇadassanappaṭilābhakiccassa siddhattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:17_21: Ādikammikānaṁ avisayo, visuṁ visuṁ lakkhaṇa rasādīhi pariggahetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā.
anya-e0401n8:17_22: Pariggahaṇe sakkontassapi vipassanā kamme visuṁ visuṁ passituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā ca.
anya-e0401n8:17_29: Suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā īhābyāpārānaṁ abhāvadassanatoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:17_32: ‘‘Tadatthā bhinivesavasenā’’ti satto, puggalo, tiādi vohārassa sabbhāvato tassa atthabhūto sattapuggalādikopi sabhāvato atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:17_33: No natthīti evaṁ daḷhaṁ hadaye sannidhānakaraṇa vasena.
anya-e0401n8:17_34: ‘‘Atidhāvanañcā’’ti vohāra paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā taṁ atikkamitvā pañcakkhandhe sattādibhāvena gahaṇañcāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:18_9: Ekassa sattassa anamatagge saṁsāre saṁsarantassa rūpakāyopi atthi nāmakāyopi atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_11: Dve ca kāyā pañcavokāre saṁsarantassa ekato pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_13: So eva tattha ekosattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:18_14: Arūpe saṁsarantassa nāma kāyo eva pavattati.
anya-e0401n8:18_15: So eva tattha eko sattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:18_17: Tesu ca kāyesu rūpakāye cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ anantara paccayatā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_18: Ekamekasmiṁ bhave ekameko hutvā cutikāle bhijjati.
anya-e0401n8:18_20: Paṭisandhirūpena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho nappavattati.
anya-e0401n8:18_21: Nāma kāye pana cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ anantarapaccayatā atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_23: Paṭisandhi nāmena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_24: Tattha paṭiccasamuppāda kusalo bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppādaññāṇe ṭhatvā ekasmiṁbhave ekassa sattassa pavattiṁ passanto sattaṁ nāma na passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_28: Ahaṁ atītesu bhavesu ahosintipi na passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_31: Atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_32: Saṅkhāra paccayā bhavantare viññāṇaṁ pavattatītiādinā nayena nāmarūpa dhammānaṁ hetuphala paramparāvasena avicchedappavattimeva passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_33: Ekasmiṁbhave pavattiṁ passante sati, anamataggesaṁsāre anantesu bhavesu tassa sattassa pavatti diṭṭhā eva hoti tatthapi evameva, tatthapi evamevāti.
anya-e0401n8:18_34: Tadā tassa soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahīyatīti imamatthaṁ ‘‘dassento anamatagge saṁsāre’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:18_40: Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānanti evaṁ pubbante pañcavidhā kaṅkhāvuttā.
anya-e0401n8:18_45: Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti evaṁ aparante pañcavidhā kaṅkhā vuttā .
anya-e0401n8:18_50: Ahaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato.
anya-e0401n8:18_51: So kuhiṁ gāmī bhavissāmīti evaṁ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:18_53: Tattha ahosiṁ nu kho, na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_54: Sace atthi, kiṁ nu kho ahosinti kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_57: Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṁjāto ahosinti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_65: Atha tesu apādakādīsu aññataro ahaṁ ahosiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_67: Pathamabhave kiṁ hutvā dutīya bhavādīsu kiṁ ahosinti idaṁ bhavaparamparāvasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_69: Paccuppanne ‘‘ahaṁ nu kho smi, no nu kho smī’’ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.
anya-e0401n8:18_73: ‘‘Sītasmī’’ti ahaṁ ucchinnovā bhavāmīti attho. Yathā ca.
anya-e0401n8:18_79: Tathā idhāpi ahaṁ nu kho smi.
anya-e0401n8:18_81: Tattha ‘‘ahaṁ nu khosmī’’ti ayaṁ ahaṁ nāma bhavābhavesu niccakālaṁ asmi nu kho, mama attānāma sassato hutvā sabbakālaṁ atthi nu khoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_82: ‘‘No nu kho smī’’ti tathā no asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_83: Mama attā tathā natthi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_84: Ettha ca ‘‘bhavābhavesū’’ti pavattepi paccuppanne vattamānaṁ attānaṁ gahetvā pavattā paccuppanne saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_85: ‘‘Kiṁ nu kho smī’’ti ahaṁ nāma santo jāto kiṁ nu kho asmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_86: Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_87: Kenaci iddhimantena vā nimmito bhavāmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_88: Udāhu ahetu apaccayā vā kenaci animmito vā sayaṁ nu kho bhavāmi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_89: ‘‘Kathaṁ nu kho smī’’ti ettha pana apadādīhi ayojetvā ahaṁ nu kho kiṁ gotto bhavāmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_90: Gotamagotto vā vāseṭṭha gotto vā tiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_91: Ādi kappakāle tāni gottāni etarahi sambhedaṁ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_93: ‘‘Ahaṁ kuto āgato’’ti ahaṁ atīte kutobhavato āgato asmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_94: ‘‘Sokuhiṁgāmī bhavissāmī’’ti so ahaṁ āyatiṁ bhave kuhiṁ gāmiko bhavissāmīti kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_95: ‘‘Kaṅkhāya atikkamo’’ti so bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppāde avijjādikaṁ atītahetu pañcakaṁ passanto tasmiṁbhave sabbaṁpi paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_96: Evaṁ passanto na tattha ahaṁ nāma koci atthi, yaṁ paṭicca atīta visayā pañcavidhā kaṅkhā uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:18_97: Dhamma mattameva tattha atthīti evaṁ atīte kaṅkhā vatthussa abhāvadassanena pañcavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamo hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_98: Nanu tathā passantassapi kathaṁ nu kho smi, kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu khoti ayaṁ kaṅkhā atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_99: Tathā passantopi hi vinā pubbenivāsaññāṇena atīte bhave ahaṁ dvipādako ahosintivā catuppādako ahosinti vā tato cuto asukabhave uppannoti vā na jānāti na passatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n8:18_100: Sā pana kaṅkhā dhamma mattappavatti dassanato paṭṭhāya antarāyika kaṅkhā na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_103: Tathā anāgate phalapañcakaṁ passanto aparante pañcavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_104: Paccuppanne phalapañcakañca hetupañcakañca passanto paccuppanne kaṅkhā chakkaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_106: Aṭṭhavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamane pana paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomappaṭilomaṁ passanto desanā dhamme ca lokuttara dhammesu ca kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_107: Dhamme kaṅkhātikkamanena saheva desente satthari ca, yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipanne saṅghe ca, tīsu sikkhāsu ca, yathāvutte pubbante ca, aparante ca, pubbantā parantesu ca, paṭiccasamuppādena saha paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ca sabbaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_109: Tattha ‘‘sabhāvadhammappavattiyā cā’’ti paccayaparamparāvasena sabhāvadhammānaṁ paramparappavattiyā ca.
anya-e0401n8:18_110: Dhammasu dhammatā nāma desanā dhammassa svākkhātatādibhāvena sundara dhammatā.
anya-e0401n8:18_112: Buddhasubuddhatā nāma taṁ dhammaṁ desentassa buddhassa sabbaññubuddhatā.
anya-e0401n8:19_0: Pariyuṭṭhitānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ nāma heṭṭhā dhammavavatthāna vasena paccayapariggahavasena ca sijjhati.
anya-e0401n8:19_1: Vipassanā kammaṁ pana anusayabhūtānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ sallikhanatthāya karīyatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘anusaya samūhananatthañcā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:19_5: ‘‘Yaṁ dūre santikevā’’ti yaṁ dūre pavattaṁ rūpaṁ vā, santike pavattaṁ rūpaṁvāti pāṭhaseso.
anya-e0401n8:19_7: ‘‘Ñāṇena daḷhaṁ gahetvā’’ti dhammavavatthānaññāṇena suṭṭhuvibhūtaṁ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:19_10: Puna daḷhaṁ gahitassa rūpassa aniccalakkhaṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sā ca kriyā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_16: Visuṁ visunti vuttattā tāsaṁ aññamaññañca sahajātesu gahaṇaṁ sambhavatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘āpādīnaṁ’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:19_19: ‘‘Tathā tathā kappetvā’’ti rūpadhammānaṁ santati parivatti nāma abhikkamantassa evaṁ bhaveyya, paṭikkamantassa evaṁ bhaveyya, tathā samiñjantassa pasārentassātiādinā parikappetvā.
anya-e0401n8:19_20: ‘‘Sesakhandhesupi taṁ taṁ santati nānattaṁ’’ti vedanākkhandhe tāva kāye kāyikasukhasantati dukkhasantatīnaṁ nānattaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_24: Yadā citte somanassa domanassāni na sandissanti, tadā idāni upekkhā me vedanā pavattatīti vā, yadā tāni sandissanti , tadā sā nirujjhatīti vā evaṁ takketvā sammasitabbāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_26: Saṅkhārakkhandhe rūpasañcetanā saddasañcetanādīnaṁ vasena, nānāvitakka vicārādīnaṁ vasena, lobhālobha dosādosa mohāmohādīnaṁ vasena ca.
anya-e0401n8:19_27: Viññāṇakkhandhe cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṁ, kusalā kusalaviññāṇādīnañca vasena santati nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_28: Vissāsaṁ karotīti vatvā tadatthaṁ vivarati ‘‘etaṁ me’’tiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:19_37: Tayo hi pariggahā taṇhā pariggaho, mānapariggaho, diṭṭhipariggahoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_38: Vase sabbaso vattanto nāma kevalaṁ vasāyattavuttiko eva siyā, na paccayāyattavuttikoti dassento ‘‘yathāvuttehī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:19_40: ‘‘Tathāpariggahetabbo’’ti eso me attāti evaṁ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahetabbo.
anya-e0401n8:19_41: Tathā hi yo attano vasena vattati, tasmiṁ attano sāmibhāvo natthi.
anya-e0401n8:19_42: Yasmiñca sāmibhāvo natthi, tasmiṁ rūpādike dhamme attānaṁ sāmikaṁ katvā eso mama attāti pariggaho nāma micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_43: Tathā yo ca khaṇika dhammo hoti, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati, taṁ rūpādikaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ attano sāraṁ katvā tathā pariggahopi micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_44: Ettha ca ‘‘micchā evā’’ti paramattha saccaṁ patvā micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_46: ‘‘Sukhaṁ viddhaṁsetī’’ti kāyikasukhañca cetasika sukhañca viddhaṁseti. Vināseti.
anya-e0401n8:19_47: ‘‘Nānādukkhaṁ janetī’’ti kāyikadukkhañca cetasika dukkhañca janeti uppādeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_49: Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ sattānaṁ yathāpavattaṁ manussa sukhaṁ viddhaṁseti, jiṇṇabhinnabhāvaṁ pāpeti, nānādukkhaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_50: Sayaṁ apāyattabhāvaṁ gahetvā tesaṁ nānāapāya dukkhaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_51: Tathā devattabhāve sakkattabhāve brahmattabhāve ṭhitānantiādinā vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_52: Tathā manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ nānāvipariṇāma kiccehi yathāpavattaṁ sukhaṁ viddhaṁseti, nānāpaccayābhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi nānādukkhaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_54: ‘‘Sāronāma thāmabalaviseso vuccatī’’ti etena thāmabalavisesena sampannaṁ vatthuṁpi saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:19_55: ‘‘Asārakaṭṭhenā’’ti ettha sāro eva sārakaṁ, na sārakaṁ asārakanti imamatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘rūpaṁ pana sayaṁpi evarūpo sāro na hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_56: Sattānaṁ attasāro jīvasāro na hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:19_57: Natthi sāro etassāti asārakanti imamatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘na ca evarūpena sārena yuttaṁ’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_59: Tattha purimo attho rūpaṁ attato samanupassatīti idaṁ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_60: Pacchimo rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁti imāni sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_61: Etena asārakaṭṭhenāti asārabhāvena, asārayuttabhāvena vāti ca.
anya-e0401n8:19_62: Anattāti etthapi na attā anattā, natthi attā etassāti vā anattāti ca dvidhā attho sijjhati.
anya-e0401n8:19_65: Etena anattabhāve siddhe dukkhabhāvopi siddhoti dasseti.
anya-e0401n8:19_66: ‘‘Tiṇṇaṁ vayānaṁ vasena addhābhedo yojetabbo’’ti pathamavaye pavattaṁ rūpaṁ dutīyavayaṁ na pāpuṇāti, pathamavaye eva nirujjhatītiādinā addhāpaccuppanne antogadhabhedo yojetabbo.
anya-e0401n8:19_67: ‘‘Sabhāgekasantānavasenā’’ti sabhāgānaṁ dhammānaṁ sabhāgaṭṭhena ekībhūtā santati sabhāgekasantati.
anya-e0401n8:19_68: ‘‘Sabhāgānaṁ dhammānaṁ’’ti ca cittajesutāva nirantarappavattena lobhasampayuttacittena sahajātā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpadhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:19_71: Utujesu nirantarappavattena sītautunā samuṭṭhitā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpa dhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:19_76: Evañca katvā heṭṭhā aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti pade catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ santati vibhāganayo suṭṭhu dassitoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_77: ‘‘Aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ’’ti imasmiṁ ñāṇepi udayabbayaññāṇepi bhaṅgaññāṇepi aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_78: Bhayaññāṇe ca ādīnavaññāṇe ca nibbidāñāṇe ca dukkhalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_79: Upari catūsu ñāṇesu anattalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānanti.
anya-e0401n8:19_84: Appahīna vasenāti pāḷipade pana avijjā taṇhā diṭṭhānusayānaṁ appahīnaṭṭhena santāne vijjamānatā eva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_93: Tasmiṁ bhave nirodho nāma bhavantare puna anuppādo yevāti vuttaṁ ‘‘bhavantare’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:19_94: ‘‘Taṁ santatiyaṁ’’ti tasmiṁ paccuppanna bhaveti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_95: ‘‘Puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṁ nirodhaṁ’’ti santati nirodho nāma vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_97: Etāhi paccaye sati, bhavantare uppajjīssanti yevāti.
anya-e0401n8:19_98: Idāni yathāpavatta santatīsu pariyāpannānaṁ sabbapacchimānaṁ nāmarūpānaṁ khaṇikanirodhavasena atthaṁ vadanto ‘‘yathāpavatta santatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjantī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_99: ‘‘Udayabbayaṁ samanupassantassa cā’’ti ettha katamo udayo nāma, katamo vayo nāma, kathañca tadubhayaṁ samanupassatīti āha ‘‘udayabbayaṁ passantassāti ettha yathā nāmā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_102: Antara dhāyati .‘‘Udayo’’ti uppādo ceva vaḍḍhi ca.
anya-e0401n8:20_0: Bojjhaṅga dhammehi sampannattā ārādheti attano cittaṁti āraddho.
anya-e0401n8:20_4: Duvidhohi vipassako taruṇa vipassako ca āraddha vipassako ca.
anya-e0401n8:20_5: Tattha khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu apassanto dubbalavipassako taruṇa vipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n8:20_6: Khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu passanto vipassanā kamme ārādhita citto balavavipassako āraddhavipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n8:23_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, samma dhammaṁ vipassato,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:26_0: Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṁ,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:27_1: Vipassanaṁ upecca kilesenti, malīnabhāvaṁ gamentīti vipassanupakkilesā.
anya-e0401n8:27_2: Paribandhanti nīvārentīti paribandhakāti heṭṭhā vuttameva antarāyika dhammānaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_4: ‘‘Pañcavidhā pītī’’ti khuddikā pīti, khaṇikā pīti, okkantikā pīti, ubbegā pīti, pharaṇā pītīti.
anya-e0401n8:27_6: Vipassanā kamme okappanākārappavattā saddhāeva adhimuccanaṭṭhena adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho.
anya-e0401n8:27_12: ‘‘Tatramajjhattupekkhā’’ti cittassa līnuddhaccādīhi visamantehi vimuttā tatramajjhattatāsaṅkhātā upekkhā.
anya-e0401n8:27_16: ‘‘Sukhumā taṇhā’’ti kusalehi missakattā idaṁ akusalantipi jānituṁ asakkuṇeyyā sukhumataṇhā.
anya-e0401n8:27_26: Idāneva naṁ visodhemi, na ciraṁ pavattituṁ dassāmīti imamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:27_29: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ nikanti vikkhambhanassa visuṁ vuttattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:27_30: Vipassanāparipāko nāma visesantarappavattena pākaṭoti dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṁ pattā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:27_36: Yadi evaṁ gotrabhupi vuṭṭhānaṁ nāma siyāti. Na siyā.
anya-e0401n8:27_40: ‘‘Taṁ samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā’’ti tena maggena samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:27_41: ‘‘Vaṭṭappavattato cā’’ti āyatiṁ bhavesu apāyavaṭṭappavattato vā, aṭṭhama bhavato paṭṭhāya kāmasugati vaṭṭappavattato vā.
anya-e0401n8:27_42: Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gameti sampāpetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:27_43: ‘‘Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchantī’’ti idha ṭhitānaṁ vuṭṭhānato nivatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:27_45: Sabbaññu bodhisattā pana pubbabuddhānaṁ sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanā kammaṁ ārabhantā anulomaññāṇaṁ āhacca ṭhapentīti aṭṭhaka thāsu vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_46: Tattha ‘‘āhaccā’’ti idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa matthakapattidassanatthaṁ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_47: ‘‘Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ’’ti tato pubbabhāge kenaci cittena aggahite nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_50: Gottaṁ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:27_51: Kathaṁ pana gotrabhu cittaṁ gotrabhuññāṇaṁ puthujjanagottaṁ chindati, ariyagottaṁ pāpuṇātīti yujjeyya, sohi puggalo tasmiṁkhaṇe puthujjanagottapariyāpannoevāti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_52: Attani pana chinnattā sayaṁ chindati nāma.
anya-e0401n8:27_53: Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṁ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena ariyagottaṁ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_54: Paccayasattivisesena attano anantare ariyagottaṁ bhāveti, pātubhāvetīti gotrabhūtipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n8:27_58: Na te dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_59: Kathaṁ te dhamme ārammaṇaṁ akaronto maggo te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti.
anya-e0401n8:27_61: So hi sammohaṁ pajahanto ārammaṇaṁ karontānipi hi pubbabhāgaññāṇāni tappahānakiccassa asādhakattā dukkha saccaṁ parijānantānīti na vuccanti.
anya-e0401n8:27_62: Maggo pana ārammaṇaṁ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṁ saccaṁ parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n8:27_63: Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṁ tasmiṁsacce parijānana kiccassa siddhattā.
anya-e0401n8:27_64: Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā andho hoti.
anya-e0401n8:27_66: Yadā pana so ekaṁ tejavantaṁ añjanaṁ labhitvā cakkhuṁ añjayanto sabbarattiṁ niddāyati.
anya-e0401n8:27_69: Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:27_72: Ekadesena vā heṭṭhimamaggesu, anavasesena vā arahattamagge.
anya-e0401n8:27_75: ‘‘Puna anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṁ’’ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna anuppādasabhāvaṁ āpajjanti, nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n8:27_77: ‘‘Uppādanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāyā’’ti etena maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā vaḍḍhanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāso natthīti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_78: Ariyamaggaṁ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi maggabhāvanā eva.
anya-e0401n8:27_79: Sā ca ariyamaggaṁ patvā matthakapattā hoti.
anya-e0401n8:27_80: Tasmā ariyamaggo eva matthakapatto bhāvanānuttaro hotīti imināpariyāyena vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāyātipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:27_83: Tassa ca tatoparaṁ dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni pavattantīti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:27_87: Taṁ rūpaṁ tassa pākaṭaṁ na tāva hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:27_89: ‘‘Paccavekkhanavāresū’’ti ettha pasādacakkhunā diṭṭhe pavattā anubandhaka vīthiyopi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n8:28_6: ‘‘Aviruddhā hotī’’ti visuddhimaggena asamentāpi paccavekkhantānaṁ icchānurūpasambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:28_9: ‘‘No laddhuṁ na vaṭṭatī’’ti aladdhuṁ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:28_10: Laddhuṁ no na vaṭṭatīti vā yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:29_2: ‘‘Kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitāya adiṭṭhattā’’ti etena eso me attā, na parassa attāti evaṁ attānaṁ attassa sāmikaṁ katvā gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n8:29_3: Tattha kevalasaddena paramattha saccaṁ patvā attasseva abhāvato khandhapañcakassa attanovasāyatta vuttitaṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n8:29_4: Sammuti saccaṁ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attano vasāyatta vuttiṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_5: ‘‘Khaṇabhaṅgassa ca adiṭṭhattā’’ti etena eso me sāraṭṭhena attā.
anya-e0401n8:29_8: Yāva vassasataṁpi vassasahassampi etaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ na bhijjati, na vinassati.
anya-e0401n8:29_12: Ahañca mama khandhapañcakañca advayaṁ anānattanti evaṁ gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n8:29_13: Tattha ‘‘khaṇabhaṅgassā’’ti nāmarūpadhammānaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhañjanassa bhijjanassa maraṇassa.
anya-e0401n8:29_16: Tasmā taṁ apassanto mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attanosāraṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0401n8:29_17: ‘‘Taṁ dvayaṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ katvā’’ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n8:29_18: Tattha pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n8:29_19: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_20: So paramatthasaccaṁ patvā eso mama santakantipi vattuṁ nārahati.
anya-e0401n8:29_22: Api ca, satto nāma sabhāvato natthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_24: Yo ‘ahanti vā, meti vā, mamāti vā, gayheyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_25: Asante ca attasmiṁ ko mama attā nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_28: Satto ca nāma ekasmiṁbhave ādimhi sakiṁ eva jāyati.
anya-e0401n8:29_30: Antarā vassasataṁpi vassasahassaṁpi maraṇaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_33: Evaṁsante kathaṁ khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti.
anya-e0401n8:29_34: Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva.
anya-e0401n8:29_35: Apica ‘‘avasavattanaṭṭhenā’’ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne eko padhānadhammo.
anya-e0401n8:29_37: So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_40: Tathā ca sati, rūpaṁ attāti gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṁ katvā gaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0401n8:29_43: Evañcasati, satto ca khandhapañcakañca vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṁ ekattaṁ gacchati, eko sattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_44: Na hi imasmiṁ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_45: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati, icchā pavattati.
anya-e0401n8:29_46: Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi niccakālaṁ sattassavasaṁ anugaccheyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_47: Kasmā, sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa ca nānattābhāvato.
anya-e0401n8:29_49: Rūpaṁ me attā, vedanā me attātiādiggahaṇaṁ vaṭṭeyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_52: Na hi dubbaṇṇo durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṁ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṁ surūpaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_60: Ajaraṁ vā amaraṇaṁ vā kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_62: Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_64: Sakkovā sakkattā, māro vā mārattā, brahmā vā brahmattāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_66: Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṁ patvā khandhapañcake attano sāmikiccaṁ issarakiccaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_68: Tathā ca sati, attānaṁ tassa sāmiṁ issaraṁ katvā rūpaṁ me attāti gahaṇaṁ micchāgahaṇaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:29_69: Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ na jānanti, na passanti, na paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_70: Tesaṁ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi.
anya-e0401n8:29_72: Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṁ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṁ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_77: Tassa khandhapañcakaṁ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_79: Tathāhi gantuṁ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_82: Tattha yesaṁ dhane asati, yaṁ yaṁ dukkhaṁ āgaccheyya kāyikaṁ vā cetasikaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:29_83: Tesaṁ taṁ taṁ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:29_87: Tathā nānārammaṇānaṁ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṁ vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu.
anya-e0401n8:29_88: Evaṁ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_91: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca.
anya-e0401n8:29_92: Vaso pana gamanassa paccayeka desamattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_93: So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṁ uppajjituṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_96: Evañca sati, idaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ paccayāyatta vuttikanticceva vattuṁ arahati.
anya-e0401n8:29_98: Api ca gantuṁ icchanto gacchatīti paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_99: Khandhapañcakaṁ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_105: Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce. Atthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_107: Antarāyevā āgate pakkhalante vā sati, gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_109: ‘‘Vipallāsanimittaṁ’’ti ca vipallāsa dhammānaṁ vasena upaṭṭhitaṁ kicca nimittaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_112: Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṁ nāma ati gambhīraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_114: Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha ‘‘saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_115: Tattha ‘‘attha siddhi nāmā’’ti maggaphalappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa atthassa siddhi nāma.
anya-e0401n8:29_120: Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:29_128: Unnatilakkhaṇo ca ahaṁ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha ‘‘aniccadassanavasenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_135: ‘‘Tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ’’ti paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ indriya dhammānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_136: ‘‘Vipassanā gamanavasene vā’’ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n8:30_0: Idāni pubbe yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti.
anya-e0401n8:30_2: Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha ‘‘dhammo’’ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṁ, dhammo, dhīti, cāgo,ti ettha viya.
anya-e0401n8:30_4: Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṁ labhatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Athavā.
anya-e0401n8:30_6: Suññatadassanañca nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_7: Iti suddhadhammaṁ anussarati, ñāṇagatiyā anugacchatīti dhammānusārī.
anya-e0401n8:30_9: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṁ taṁ maggaphalaṁ pattoti diṭṭhipatto.
anya-e0401n8:30_10: Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n8:30_11: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_14: Tādise hi ñāṇe sati, tattha aveccappasādo nāma jāyati, no aññathāti.
anya-e0401n8:30_16: Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṁ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_20: Attano kāye eva laddhaṁ sakkhaṁ yassāti kāyasakkhī.
anya-e0401n8:30_21: Dukkhānu passī puggalo hi saṁvega bahulo hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_24: Tasmā so saṁvegavasena bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjanto yaṁ yaṁ purisathāmena pattabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_26: Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n8:30_27: Sandiṭṭhaṁ jhānasukhaṁ vā maggaphalasukhaṁ vā labhatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_28: ‘‘Ubhatobhāga vimutto’’ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṁ ubhohi kāyabhāgehi vimutto.
anya-e0401n8:30_29: Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko ca.
anya-e0401n8:30_30: Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_31: Saddhānusārī ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_32: Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_34: Abhidhamme pana puggala paññattiyaṁ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:30_35: Arahattaṁ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n8:30_36: Ettha siyā, saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_37: Kiṁ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṁ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0401n8:30_40: Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṁyutte cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī, yo evaṁ saddahati, evaṁ adhimuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_44: So yenakammena apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n8:30_49: Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_52: Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatoti vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:30_53: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṁ aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā.
anya-e0401n8:30_54: Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ santati parivattanādikaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_55: Tañhi passanto cakkhādīnaṁ aniccabhāve saddahati, adhimuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_56: Tānipi khaṇe khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṁ saddhāvinicchayaṁ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:30_57: ‘‘Buddhe aveccappasādenā’’ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṁ buddhaguṇādīnaṁ dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_58: Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_60: Kathaṁ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṁ okkantatā ca viññāyatīti āha ‘‘so yenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_61: Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṁ apāyagāmi kammaṁ na karoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_62: So ekantena puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkanto, ariyabhūmiṁ okkantoti viññāyatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_64: Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n8:30_67: Tattha ‘‘mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamatī’’ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā cakkhādīnaṁ tādisaṁ aniccataṁ samanupassanto thokaṁ thokaṁ dassanaṁ labhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:30_68: Evaṁsati, cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṁ olokanaṁ mattaso khamanti nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_70: Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n8:30_73: Tattha ‘‘pajānāti passatī’’ti dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti, ñāṇacakkhuno paccakkhato passatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:31_0: ‘‘Yathā sakaṁ phalaṁ’’ti ettha sassa attano idaṁ sakaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:31_1: Yaṁ yaṁ sakaṁ yathāsakanti atthaṁ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:31_2: Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṁ pana anulomajavanāni eva phalānaṁ āsannakāraṇāni, na maggajavanānīti āha ‘‘na maggāgamanavasenā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:32_4: Idaṁpi vipassanāñāṇaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti samanupassitabbā ca hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:32_5: Tattha ca abhidhammaṁ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṁ hoti, na kiccappadhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:32_6: Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṁ maggassa dātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:32_8: Kilesa dhammā nāma yassa uppajjanti, taṁ puggalaṁ palibundhanti.
anya-e0401n8:32_11: Taṁ puggalaṁ niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti.
anya-e0401n8:32_13: Taṁ puggalaṁ ārammaṇesu bhusaṁ nihitaṁ niviṭṭhaṁ karonti.
anya-e0401n8:32_15: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0401n8:32_17: Evaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṁ abhāvo.
anya-e0401n8:32_18: Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṁ ‘‘ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_0: ‘‘Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī’’ti idaṁ tāsaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ attadiṭṭhiyā avinābhāvaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:33_1: Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_5: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā akusaladhammā diṭṭhivicikicchāggahaṇena gahitāti āha ‘‘diṭṭhivicikicchā vippayuttā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:33_24: Vikappatthehi sati dve eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n8:33_27: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati.
anya-e0401n8:33_28: Nanu ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo, na aniyamatthe.
anya-e0401n8:33_29: Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti ce. Na yutto. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n8:33_31: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthaṁ gahetvā te dve puggalā imasmiṁ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_34: Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_37: Paramo nāma vutto’’ti idaṁ upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_38: So ca sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:33_40: ‘‘Idha niṭṭhā’’ti imasmiṁ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṁ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti vasena niṭṭhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_44: Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṁ bhavabījaṁ assa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0401n8:33_47: Kena pana tiṇṇaṁ sotāpannānaṁ viseso katoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_48: Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṁ pathamamagga sampayuttehi indriyehi kato.
anya-e0401n8:33_49: Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_52: So pana cha bhaviko, pañcabhaviko, catubhaviko, tibhaviko, dvibhavikoti pañcavidho.
anya-e0401n8:33_56: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_57: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṁ paṭṭhapenti.
anya-e0401n8:33_58: Tadā tesaṁ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni.
anya-e0401n8:33_59: Tasmā te sattakkhattu paramato tikkhānāma hontīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_60: ‘‘Sattavārato oraṁ vā’’ti idaṁ kolaṁkola ekabījino sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_61: ‘‘Upari tiṇṇaṁ maggānaṁ vipassanā niyāmetī’’ti idaṁ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_63: Tathāhi soyeva saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṁ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattu paramo sotāpanno nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_64: Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṁ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva āgatāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_68: Aṅguttarapāṭhe ‘‘tenacittappasādenā’’ti mahāsahassilokadhātuṁ sarena viññāpetuṁ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_70: ‘‘Tena pariyāyenā’’ti sace so devesu eva saṁsarati.
anya-e0401n8:33_71: Sattakkhattuṁ opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0401n8:33_74: Evaṁ desanā vārena cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho.
anya-e0401n8:33_75: ‘‘Taṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ’’ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena sayaṁ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:33_85: ‘‘Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā’’ti sattabhavato uddhaṁ kāmabhave paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_89: Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṁ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:33_91: ‘‘Tadekaṭṭhamohassā’’ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṁ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_102: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṁ kālaṁ adhicca atikkamma uppatti .
anya-e0401n8:33_105: ‘‘Methunavatthu samāyogo icchito’’ti jāyampatīnaṁ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṁ atthīti icchito.
anya-e0401n8:33_113: Keci imaṁ vatthuṁ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṁ na rocenti.
anya-e0401n8:33_116: ‘‘Sakadāgāmittaṁ byākataṁ’’ti tasmiṁ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ patvā tusitākāyaṁ upapannoti evaṁ tassa yaṁ sakadāgāmittaṁ bhagavatā byākataṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_118: Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:33_119: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṁ nāma tikkhapaññassa ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti.
anya-e0401n8:33_121: ‘‘Sakiṁdeva imaṁlokaṁ āgantvā’’ti etena ito paralokaṁ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca siddhattā ayaṁ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti siddho. Kathaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_122: Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_123: Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_129: Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho.
anya-e0401n8:33_130: Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_131: Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_133: Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi.
anya-e0401n8:33_135: Atthato aviruddhe sati, vohāramattena saṅkare doso natthīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_138: Āgamanasīlo āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho.
anya-e0401n8:33_144: Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha samādhikkhandha paññākkhandha vimuttikkhandha vimuttiññāṇa dassanakkhandhaguṇā.
anya-e0401n8:33_150: Pāḷiyaṁ saddhāvāhī maggaṁ bhāveti, paññāvāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_151: Na pana vuttaṁ vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_153: Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti na vuttanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n8:33_154: Maggaṁ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ pahānāya kammaṁ mahantaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_156: Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_157: Yasmiṁ ārammaṇe saddhā nivisati, tasmiṁ vicikicchā natthi.
anya-e0401n8:33_158: Yasmiṁ vicikicchā nivisati, tasmiṁ saddhā natthi.
anya-e0401n8:33_162: Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṁ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:33_164: Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu aveccappasādamattenapi diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahitvā saddhānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṁ pasīditvā saddhāvimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_165: Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṁ katvā dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṁ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_166: Vīriyaṁ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_167: Atha kho tāsaṁ sahāyopi hoti, dhurabhūtañca.
anya-e0401n8:33_169: Taṁ saddhaṁpi paggaṇhāti, paññaṁpi paggaṇhāti, diṭṭhiṁpi paggaṇhāti, vicikicchampi paggaṇhātiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:33_170: Kutopana attano sabhāvena diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṁ sakkhissati.
anya-e0401n8:33_171: Tasmā imasmiṁ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti ca na vuttoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_172: Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_173: Vīriyañca sayaṁ sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṁ upabrūheti.
anya-e0401n8:33_174: So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_175: Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_176: Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
anya-e0401n8:33_186: ‘‘Tayo antarā parinibbāyino’’ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṁ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
anya-e0401n8:33_193: Vipassanā kammaṁ sasaṅkhāraṁ sappayogaṁ katvā parinibbāyī sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n8:33_194: Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n8:33_196: Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā dvādasa.
anya-e0401n8:34_5: Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi.
anya-e0401n8:34_12: Nānattasaññā nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā.
anya-e0401n8:34_13: Dutīyajjhāne vitakka vicārānaṁ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho.
anya-e0401n8:34_17: Yuganandhaṁ nāma dvandabandhanaṁ, samathavipassanānaṁ yuganandhanti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:34_18: ‘‘Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā’’ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṁ samāpajjanañca vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_19: Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato visuṁ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṁ natthīti vuttaṁ ‘‘attano sarīrābaddhe parikkhāre ṭhapetvā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:34_27: Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṁ na sakkāhoti.
anya-e0401n8:34_28: Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṁ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n8:34_29: Etañhi vattaṁ yaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṁ vā upaṭṭhākānaṁ vā appamādakathānu sāsanikammaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_33: Yaṁ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu maraṇaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:35_4: Tattha ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n8:35_6: Yañcasukhaṁ te āmise paṭicca uppajjati, taṁ sāmisasukhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:35_7: Yaṁ loke dibbaṁ sukhaṁ mānusakaṁ sukhanti mamāyanti.
anya-e0401n8:35_8: Yañca anubhavantaṁ mahājanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti.
anya-e0401n8:35_9: Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṁ pana nirāmisasukhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:35_10: Yaṁ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:35_11: Yañca anubhavantaṁ ariyajanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti.
anya-e0401n8:35_12: ‘‘Assāditabbaṭṭhenā’’ti kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṁ ahosukhanti udāharantenapi assāditabbaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0401n8:38_8: ‘‘Abhivuḍḍhānaṁ’’ti hānabhāgiya ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvaṁ atikkammavisesabhāgiya nibbedhabhāgiya bhāvapattivasena atissaya vuḍḍhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_13: Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:38_19: Kathaṁ nu kho ime janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṁ pavatto cittabyāpāro.
anya-e0401n8:38_22: ‘‘Patthitaṁ’’ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṁ thero evarūpaṁ pakaraṇaṁ kareyyāti evaṁ cirakālaṁ patthitaṁ āsiṁsitanti attho.
anya-e0401n8:38_27: ‘‘Saddo’’ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṁ maṅgalahatthiṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0401n8:38_28: Netaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ raññā katanti evaṁ pavatto amanāpasaddo.
anya-e0401n8:38_34: Yasmiṁ raṭṭhe taṁ abhimaṅgalaṁ karonti, tasmiṁ raṭṭhe devo sammā vassati, nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṁ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti.
anya-e0401n8:38_51: Taṁ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā.
anya-e0401n8:38_53: Pāpaṁ dhammaṁ garahantiādīnavaṁ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n8:38_59: Loke bahūsu dassanesu ito uttaraṁ aññaṁ dassanaṁ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_62: Ratanattayaguṇakathāsavanaṁ , khandhāyatana dhātu saccapaṭiccasamuppādakathāsavanañca savanānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_63: Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_65: Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṁ pāricariyānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_66: Buddhapaññattāsu tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṁ sikkhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_67: Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike guṇe avassaṁ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino.
anya-e0401n8:40_9: Khemasubhikkhatādiguṇehi anāgate jane gamāpeti, āgate aññattha gantuṁ na detīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:40_11: ‘‘Sāke’’ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṁ kaliyugaṁ sākanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:40_13: Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko gandhārarājā.
anya-e0401n8:40_14: Yaṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṁ dhamma vinayaṁ mahāsaṅghīkaṁ nāma saṅgahaṁ āropenti.
anya-e0401n8:40_17: Cattāriyugāni nāma loke paññapenti satyayugaṁ, dvāparayugaṁ, tetrayugaṁ, kaliyuga,nti.
anya-e0401n8:40_22: ‘‘La tī’’ti sālikkhettānaṁ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṁ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṁ araññaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_23: Taṁ pana muṁrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_25: Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n8:42_0: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n8:43_0: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṁ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n8:45_0: Kāḷe navamiyaṁ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṁ gatā.
